Like many other commercial websites, our website may employ a standard technology called a "cookie" to collect information about how our site is used.

Our website provides a direct link (among others) to the TGI Fridays Give Me More Stripes Guest Recognition Program site ( www.givememorestripes.com) where, should you choose to enroll, you will be asked to submit personal information, which will be subject to the Give Me More Stripes terms and conditions, separate privacy policy and other policies.
